title: Non-custodial only
detail: No key escrow, no hosted signing, no custody, no provider control of user funds.

title: Avoid 'privacy-as-a-service' components operated by us
detail: Do not operate infrastructure that could be characterized as providing anonymisation as a managed service.

title: Geo-gate service features in RED jurisdictions
detail: Disable swaps/on-ramps/brokerage-like features in UAE/JP/KR/TH by default; treat AMBER as wallet-only unless counsel approves.

title: Plan for partner refusal
detail: Assume banks/PSPs/exchanges may refuse privacy-asset integrations; design fallbacks that do not depend on centralized rails.

title: Avoid marketing that implies evasion
detail: Do not frame privacy features as hiding from law enforcement or sanctions; emphasize lawful privacy.

title: Restricted mode for teammates in RED locations
detail: Block access to privacy-asset modules, signing keys, release pipelines, and marketing accounts while in RED zones.
